body.name: Dr. Brown's Milestones Narrow Sippy Straw Bottle, Spill-Proof with 100% Silicone Handles and Weighted Straw, 8 oz/250 mL, Gray & Blue, 6m+

features: SIPPY STRAW TRANSITION BOTTLE. Help baby develop new drinking skills using the bottle they know and love!
WEIGHTED STRAW FOR TIP AND SIP. Features a soft, 100% silicone weighted straw that moves with the liquid, so baby can tilt and sip in any direction.
EASY GRIP HANDLES. Soft yet sturdy silicone handles make gripping easy and help teach baby new motor skills. Handles can be removed as cup-holding skills improve.
SPILL-PROOF. Spill-proof lid that’s travel-friendly slides closed to keep the straw clean when not in use. Just flip the lid back to sip when baby wants a drink.
FITS ALL DR. BROWN’S NARROW BOTTLES. Both the sippy straw lid and silicone handles fit all Dr. Brown’s Options+ 8 oz/250 mL baby bottles and sippy spout bottles.
EASY TO CLEAN. All parts are removable and dishwasher (top rack) and sterilizer safe. Straw cleaning brush included.
body.description: Dr. Brown's Milestones Sippy Straw Bottle is the easy way to help baby develop new drinking skills! Baby can continue to use the bottle they love while transitioning from bottle to big kid drinking. The soft silicone weighted straw moves to follow liquid inside the bottle, so baby can tilt and sip while transitioning from tipping the bottle upside-down to sipping upright. Soft yet sturdy silicone handles make gripping easy and help teach baby new motor skills. The spill-proof lid is travel-friendly and slides closed to keep the straw clean when not in use. Both the sippy straw lid and silicone handles fit all Dr. Brown’s Options+ 8 oz/250 mL baby bottles and sippy spout bottles. Straw cleaning brush included. Dishwasher (top rack) and sterilizer safe. BPA-free. 6m+.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dr. Brown’s Narrow Transitional Sippy Bottle with Silicone Handles Dr. Brown's Wide-Neck Transitional Sippy Bottle with Silicone Handles 9 oz Green Dr. Brown’s Milestones Soft Spout Sippy Cup with Handles - Pink - 9oz - 6m+ Dr. Brown's Transition Sippy Cup with Soft Spout - Blue - 6oz - 6m+ Dr. Brown's Baby's First Straw Cup - Pink/Purple - 9oz - 2pk Dr. Brown’s Milestones Cheers360 Cup, Blue & Green, 10 oz, 2 PK Features & Benefits Soft silicone sippy spout is used in place of a nipple on the Dr. Brown’s bottle that baby is already familiar with Soft silicone sippy spout is used in place of a nipple on the Dr. Brown’s bottle that baby is already familiar with Lid folds all the way back to stay out of baby’s way and keeps spout clean when not in use Lid folds all the way back to stay out of baby’s way and keeps spout clean when not in use Soft, weighted straw lets baby drink from any angle with no spills This 360-degree sippy lets baby drink from any edge Features & Benefits Easy-to-hold removable 100% silicone handles; handles fit most narrow bottles Easy-to-hold removable 100% silicone handles; handles fit most wide-neck bottles Sturdy handles and contoured shape for good grip with little hands Sturdy handles and contoured shape for good grip with little hands Travel-friendly with attached lid that stays open and keeps straw clean when closed Sip-and-See clear silicone valve lets baby see inside without spilling, for true leak-free learning

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good water bottle.
reviews.reviewText: I kind of wish I could have just bought the attachments as I have a ton of the browns bottles that I would have loved to progress to this instead of buying more bottles. But the good news, if your child doesn’t like these, you can still use it as a bottle if you add the nipple and attachments From the other brown bottles.They don’t leak, which is great. We use it more for water than milk. My little one will drink water from it but not milk.Meh for the ease of cleaning. The straw comes off, and if You clean browns in the past. They take a moment to clean all the parts. If you are use to it. It’s a tad simpler.Every child is different. I will use again with our second.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for transition
reviews.reviewText: We grabbed this as our son was turning 1. I think you can start before 1 as well. He still uses this at the age of almost 2 for water. Its easy to clean, easy to drink from. The downside is, if the water gets stuck within the "straw" it will leak a little. But it doesn't bother me as much as other cups he has does. We love dr browns products!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to help go from bottle to sippy cup for babies!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These sippy cups with straws are an absolute game-changer – a solid 10/10 in every way! Transitioning my baby from a bottle to a sippy cup was a breeze, thanks to these innovative cups. The inclusion of hand bars is a genius design choice, providing the perfect grip for tiny hands during this crucial transition phase. What sets these cups apart is their leak-proof design – no mess, no fuss, just stress-free hydration for my little one. The straws make sipping a breeze, and the durability ensures these cups can handle the inevitable drops and tosses. If you're on the lookout for the perfect sippy cup that makes the transition seamless and mess-free, look no further. These cups are a parenting win – 10/10!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars LOVE, but doesn’t last long
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this straw bottle! It’s my 1 year olds favorite and has been since he was 10 months old for his water. It doesn’t spill and it’s fairly easy to clean as the pieces all come apart.My one knock is that we’ve already had to replace 3 of them. At some point they just stop working, as if the straw has been punctured somewhere. I can never find the hole, but it stops working as if there is one.Would absolutely give this a 5 if I didn’t have to replace them every couple months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our favorite bottle!
reviews.reviewText: My son has health issues and he aspirates when drinking. Because of this he has to be a on a special thickened diet, and he can only drink from a slow flow straw bottle. After researching all the different options, I circled back around to the Dr. Brown's Sippy Straw Bottle. (I always come back to this brand!)The best part about this bottle is that it is easy for my sons tiny hands to hold. It comes with removeable silicone handles which he can not use because he has to sit at a 90 degree angle to drink. But even without the handles, it is still the perfect size for him to hold on his own. The handles are soft and flexible and easy to remove and clean. I also love that it has a closable lid, as I often have to pre-mix his drinks and then store them in the fridge. This allows me to not have to store open drinks overnight.These cups are not hard to clean if you have a dishwasher. I simply rinse the cup and then take all the pieces apart - the bottle, the straw, the sippy spout, and the lid - and place them in the dishwasher. I have never had an issue with mold by cleaning them this way. I do think hand washing them would be a little bit more involved, especially for the straw - but the bottles do come with a long tiny brush that fits in the straw for proper cleaning.The weighted straw does not do its job as far as being able to drink from any angle. This is not a problem for us, and actually works better in my favor due to my sons health issues and requirements - but if you are looking for a straw cup that they can tip back and still be able to drink from, this is not the one.Overall this is a great cup. Any Dr. Browns users will know that they are not ideal when it comes to being easy to clean. But it's a small price to pay for a genuinely good quality sippy cup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We have 3 Dr browns straw bottles and love them! So easy to take apart and wash. Our LO loves using them too, no issues drinking from them. She has also thrown the on the tile floor countless times and no leaks or breaking of the bottles!!! Only “issue” to speak on is you just have to make sure you assemble all the parts of the straw and too well together or it won’t work. Just a very minor learning curve for us, but now that we know what we’re doing, absolutely no issues using these bottles. They even come with a brush for the straw to clean more in depth when need be. Also love that the cover slides over the straw to keep it clean when we go out and about!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was really excited for this straw bottle. My daughter used the regular dr brown bottles since she was a newborn. Now that she's older I wanted to get a transition cup. I figured this would be perfect bc it's the same bottle she's used to. The handles are great and she figured out how to use the straw pretty quick. My only complaint is that the straw leaks horribly. I stopped using the top straw part and just use the handles and the dr brown sippy nipple instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Dr. Brown's babies to transition!
reviews.reviewText: I have twin boys who are stuck on the Dr. Brown's sippy spout and we are trying these now! So far, they are fantastic. No leaks so far, a little difficult to ensure they are clean when handwashing but overall the straws come reasonably clean. They work exactly as described and my children love them. I will be purchasing more to transition them from sippy spout to straw.
Me gustaron mucho , muy recomendable son muy resistentes y prácticos para mi bebé

reviews.reviewTitle: Súper bueno como lo es todo de dr browns
reviews.reviewText: Práctico, mi bebe en un rato aprendió a usarlo y es el que más le gusta
Super resistente y bonito, lo tira y lo tira y sigue intacto, es cómodo para sus manitas (9 meses). Recomendado 🫶🏼
